thread.title: ToConceive Releases Whiteboard Video Explaining Complicated Conception Process
thread.title_full: ToConceive Releases Whiteboard Video Explaining Complicated Conception Process | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: ToConceive Releases Whiteboard Video Explaining Complicated Conception Process
text:
(MENAFN Press) ToConceive Releases Whiteboard Video Explaining Complicated Conception Process The newest video from ToConceive describes sperm capacitation why it is so crucial to getting pregnant and how the product helps with natural conception. 
Online PR News – 29-September-2015 – Even though it is basic biology the conception process is often still a complicated mystery to many couples trying to conceive. Understanding the process is crucial for timing of intercourse and a solid knowledge also helps to spot potential problems.
In a new whiteboard video ToConceive strives to educate couples on the conception process explaining sperm capacitation in an easy-to-understand and visual way. The video also explains how ToConceive works to help a woman produce her own natural conception lubrication.
ToConceive stimulates the woman to produce her own natural vaginal lubrication. This natural conception lubrication balances the pH of the vagina to support sperm survival. It also transforms the sperm to give the sperm the ability or capacity to fertilize the ovum for conception a process called sperm capacitation said Dr. Ron Thompson OB-GYN. These are all necessary functions to get pregnant.
When using ToConceive the womans natural conception lubrication increases and changes to capacitate the sperm. Sperm capacitation removes the outer layer around the sperm helps it travel to the fallopian tube and allows the sperm to penetrate and fertilize the egg. ToConceive is a daily use product applied to the clitoris and genital region after a bath or shower as well as before and during intercourse. This assures that a woman is producing her own natural conception lubrication optimizing the chances of conception each month.
It not only helps with dryness and lubrication insufficiency ToConceive also provides an optimal environment for conception. No other lubricants can balance the pH of the vagina or help a woman produce her own natural conception lubrication said Dr. Thompson.
